item.title: 特朗普警告将因购买俄罗斯石油对印度征收更高的关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普在空军一号上对记者说，如果新德里不满足华盛顿提出的限制购买俄罗斯石油的要求，美国可能会提高对印度的关税。【原文：The United States could raise tariffs on India if New Delhi doesn't meet Washington's demand to curb purchases of Russian oil, President Donald Trump told reporters aboard Air Force One.】

item.title: 报告称，2025 年中国对台湾基础设施的网络攻击平均每天达 260 万次
item.description: 台湾国家安全局说，有些演习与 "混合威胁 "军事演习同步进行，目的是瘫痪台湾岛。【原文：Some were synchronised with military drills in "hybrid threats" to paralyse the island, Taiwan's National Security Bureau said.】

item.title: 市场分析师对特朗普的委内瑞拉赌局作出反应
item.description: 在美国逮捕委内瑞拉总统尼古拉斯-马杜罗之后，全球投资者正面临着地缘政治风险的新一轮飙升，尽管市场的初步反应相对平淡，石油波动剧烈，避险资金流动提振了黄金。【原文：Global investors are facing a fresh surge in geopolitical risk after the U.S. capture of Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro, although initial market reaction has been relatively devoid of nerves with oil volatile and safe-haven flows lifting gold.】

item.title: 独家报道三星今年将把采用谷歌 "双子星 "技术的移动设备翻一番，达到 8 亿台
item.description: 三星联席首席执行官 T M Roh 告诉路透社，随着全球人工智能竞争的白热化，这将为谷歌带来超越竞争对手的优势。【原文：Samsung's co-CEO T M Roh told Reuters this would give Google an edge over rivals as the global race in artificial intelligence hots up.】

item.title: 私营企业采购经理人指数显示，中国 12 月服务业增速创 6 个月新低
item.description: 周一的一项私营部门调查显示，由于新业务增长放缓和国外需求下降，12 月份中国服务业活动的扩张速度为六个月来最慢。【原文：China's services activity expanded at its slowest pace in six months in December, as growth in new business softened and foreign demand declined, a private-sector survey showed on Monday.】

item.title: 亚洲股市摆脱委内瑞拉影响攀升；石油市场波动剧烈
item.description: 周一，亚洲股市高开，油价波动，投资者对美国周末在委内瑞拉采取的军事行动持观望态度。【原文：Asian stocks opened higher and oil prices were choppy on Monday as investors looked past U.S. military action over the weekend in Venezuela.】

item.title: 日本制造业采购经理人指数（PMI）显示：需求下降放缓，日本工厂活动保持稳定
item.description: 一项私营部门调查显示，由于需求下降速度比上月放缓，日本制造业活动在 12 月份陷入停滞，结束了连续五个月的恶化。【原文：Japan's manufacturing activity stalled in December as demand declined at a slower pace from the previous month, a private-sector survey showed, ending a five-month streak of deterioration.】

item.title: 新西兰启动对医疗门户网站黑客攻击的审查
item.description: 新西兰政府周一表示，新西兰卫生部将调查一家私营网站发生网络安全漏洞的原因，该网站托管了新西兰约三分之一人口的医疗记录，以及需要采取哪些额外保护措施。【原文：New Zealand’s health ministry will look into the cause of a cybersecurity breach of a privately owned website, which hosts medical records for roughly a third of the country’s population and what extra protections are needed, the government said Monday.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉突袭令美元走强
item.description: 新年第一个完整交易周伊始，美元便一马当先，对欧元汇率升至三周半高点，对英镑汇率也有所上涨。【原文：The dollar started the first full trading week of the new year on the front foot, rising to a 3-1/2-week high versus the euro and gaining against sterling.】

item.title: 起亚目标 2026 年汽车销量达 335 万辆
item.description: 韩国汽车制造商起亚公司在周一提交的一份监管文件中表示，该公司的目标是在2026年销售335万辆汽车。【原文：South Korean automaker Kia Corp said in a regulatory filing on Monday it is targeting 3.35 million vehicle sales in 2026.】

item.title: 高盛称美国制裁政策将决定委内瑞拉石油生产前景
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普废黜委内瑞拉总统尼古拉斯-马杜罗之后，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）分析师表示，委内瑞拉今年的石油生产前景将取决于美国的制裁政策如何演变。【原文：Venezuela's oil production outlook this year will depend on how U.S. sanctions policy evolves, Goldman Sachs analysts said, after U.S. President Donald Trump deposed Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉政局动荡，但供应充足，油价下滑
item.description: 尽管人们担心欧佩克（OPEC）成员国委内瑞拉的政治动荡会干扰石油运输，但由于供应充足，油价在周一的亚洲早盘交易中下滑。【原文：Oil prices slipped in early Asian trade on Monday on ample supply despite concerns about political upheaval in OPEC member Venezuela disrupting shipments.】

item.title: 巴克莱数据显示，激进投资者在 2025 年发起的活动数量创下历史新高
item.description: 巴克莱银行的数据显示，2025 年，推动公司改善业绩的激进投资者发起的活动数量创下历史新高，因为市场波动、有利的融资条件和更多的交易活动为游说变革提供了理想的条件。【原文：Activist investors who push companies to perform better launched a record number of campaigns in 2025, according to Barclays data, as market volatility, favorable financing conditions and more deal activity made for ideal conditions to lobby for changes.】

item.title: 美国敦促石油巨头在委内瑞拉大力投资，以收回债务
item.description: 白宫和国务院官员告诉美国石油高管迅速返回委内瑞拉，并在该国投入大量资金。【原文：White House and State Department officials told US oil executives to return to Venezuela quickly and invest significant capital in the country.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，萨克斯正在洽谈 10 亿美元贷款，以继续开门营业
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周日援引知情人士的话报道，萨克斯全球企业（Saks Global Enterprises）正在商谈获得约 10 亿美元的贷款，为未来几周可能申请破产保护做准备。【原文：Saks Global Enterprises is in talks to secure a loan of about $1 billion as it prepares for a possible Chapter 11 bankruptcy filing in the coming weeks, Bloomberg News reported on Sunday citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，L3Harris 接近向 AE Industrial 出售太空推进资产股份
item.description: 三位熟知内情的人士透露，L3Harris 科技公司即将达成一项交易，向私募股权公司 AE Industrial Partners 出售太空和推进业务投资组合中 60% 的股份，因为这家大型国防公司正在削减美国国家航空航天局（NASA）的一些业务线，以更加专注于国家安全。【原文：L3Harris Technologies is nearing a deal to sell a 60% stake in a portfolio of space and propulsion businesses to private equity firm AE Industrial Partners as the large defense company sheds some NASA business lines to sharpen focus on national security, three people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉局势动荡，油价可能走高，供应充足限制涨幅
item.description: 特朗普周六表示，对委内瑞拉出口的石油禁运仍然完全有效。【原文：Trump said on Saturday the oil embargo on Venezuelan exports remained in full effect.】

item.title: 投资者面临特朗普委内瑞拉赌博带来的更多地缘政治冲击
item.description: 马杜罗的扣押促使人们在恢复交易时逃往安全地带。【原文：Maduro's seizure prompt a flight to safety when trading resumes.】

item.title: 消息人士称，尽管成员国之间出现动荡，欧佩克+仍将保持石油产量稳定
item.description: 在 2025 年油价下跌超过 18% 之后，欧佩克+八个成员国于周日召开了会议。【原文：Sunday's meeting of eight members of OPEC+ comes after oil prices fell more than 18% in 2025.】

item.title: 开发委内瑞拉石油储备不能一蹴而就
item.description: 即使美国石油巨头在尼古拉斯-马杜罗（Nicolás Maduro）被美军抓获几小时后，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统承诺向委内瑞拉投资数十亿美元，委内瑞拉也不太可能在数年内看到原油产量有任何有意义的增长。【原文：Venezuela is unlikely to see any meaningful boost to crude output for years even if U.S. oil majors do invest the billions of dollars in the country that President Donald Trump promised just hours following Nicolás Maduro's capture by U.S. forces.】

item.title: 消息人士称委内瑞拉石油出口在政治动荡中陷入瘫痪
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）宣布封锁所有进出该国水域的受制裁油轮，委内瑞拉的石油出口已降至最低水平，据四位接近委内瑞拉石油出口的消息人士周六透露，由于港口船长没有收到授权装载船只启航的请求，委内瑞拉的石油出口现已陷入瘫痪。【原文：Venezuela's oil exports, which had fallen to a minimum amid U.S. President Donald Trump's announced blockade of all sanctioned tankers going in and out of the country's waters, are now paralyzed as port captains have not received requests to authorize loaded ships to set sail, four sources close to operations said on Saturday.】

item.title: 美联储保尔森表示再次降息可能需要一段时间
item.description: 费城联邦储备银行行长安娜-保尔森（Anna Paulson）上周六表示，在去年积极推行宽松政策之后，央行进一步降息可能尚需时日，与此同时，官员们正在评估经济表现。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Philadelphia President Anna Paulson said on Saturday that further central bank rate cuts could be some way off while officials take stock of the economy’s performance after an active campaign of easing last year.】

item.title: 投资者和经济学家对美国抓捕委内瑞拉总统马杜罗的反应
item.description: 在指控委内瑞拉总统尼古拉斯-马杜罗贩毒和非法执政数月后，美国称已于周六打击委内瑞拉并抓获其长期任职的总统尼古拉斯-马杜罗，标志着地缘政治紧张局势的急剧升级。【原文：The United States said it had struck Venezuela and captured its long-serving President Nicolas Maduro on Saturday, after months of accusing him of drug-running and illegitimacy in power, marking a dramatic escalation in geopolitical tensions.】

item.title: 特朗普以安全和中国相关问题为由阻止芯片交易
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周五以国家安全和中国相关问题为由，阻止了美国光电子公司HieFo Corp斥资300万美元收购总部位于新泽西州的航空航天与国防专家Emcore公司的资产。【原文：President Donald Trump on Friday blocked U.S. photonics firm HieFo Corp's $3 million acquisition of assets in New Jersey-based aerospace and defense specialist Emcore, citing national security and China-related concerns.】

item.title: S3 Partners称，特朗普媒体的空头兴趣在近期反弹后攀升
item.description: 金融数据公司 S3 Partners 的数据显示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的社交媒体公司最近宣布合并后，空头兴趣骤增，表明一些交易商预计该股将回吐近期涨幅。【原文：Short interest in U.S. President Donald Trump's social media company has jumped following a recent merger announcement, suggesting some traders expect the stock to give back more of its recent gains, according to financial data firm S3 Partners.】

item.title: Equinor 质疑美国暂停帝国风电项目的命令
item.description: 挪威能源集团 Equinor 周五表示，已向美国哥伦比亚特区地方法院提起民事诉讼，挑战美国内政部暂停帝国风电项目的命令。【原文：Norwegian energy group Equinor said on Friday it had filed a civil suit in the U.S. District Court for the District of Columbia challenging a U.S. Department of the Interior order to suspend its Empire Wind project.】

item.title: 消息人士称，D.E. Shaw 旗舰基金战胜了市场波动性，将在 2025 年击败标准普尔 500 指数
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的消息人士周五告诉路透社，投资公司 D.E. Shaw 旗下的两只旗舰基金在 2025 年跑赢了基准 S&P 500 指数，反映了对冲基金同行在波动性创纪录的一年中所表现出的类似实力。【原文：Investment firm D.E. Shaw's two flagship funds beat the benchmark S&P 500 index in 2025, a source familiar with the matter told Reuters on Friday, reflecting similar strength seen across hedge fund peers during a year of record volatility.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称，埃利奥特合伙人杰森-根里奇（Jason Genrich）已离开对冲基金
item.description: 据两位熟悉内情的人士透露，埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）周五告诉客户，领导该公司多项技术投资的杰森-根里奇（Jason Genrich）已经离开了这家对冲基金。【原文：Elliott Investment Management on Friday told clients that Jason Genrich, who led many of the firm's technology investments, has left the hedge fund, according to two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 伯克希尔哈撒韦公司进入后巴菲特时代，股价一路走低
item.description: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）的 "后巴菲特时代 "周五悄然开启，在 "奥马哈甲骨文 "将掌舵六十年的最高职位交给格雷格-阿贝尔后，公司股价略有下滑。【原文：Berkshire Hathaway's , post-Buffett era began quietly Friday, as shares slipped slightly after the "Oracle of Omaha" handed Greg Abel the top job following six decades at the helm.】

item.title: 法国部长向检察官举报 Grok 在 X 平台上发布与性有关的内容
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 xAI 人工智能聊天机器人 Grok 在 X 平台上生成了露骨的性内容，法国部长们已向检察官报告，并在周五的一份声明中称，这些 "性和性别歧视 "内容 "显然是非法的"。【原文：French ministers have reported to prosecutors sexually explicit content generated by Elon Musk's xAI artificial intelligence chatbot Grok on the X platform, saying in a statement on Friday the "sexual and sexist" content was "manifestly illegal".】
